entry.title: Canada Goes All In on AI: NVIDIA Joins Nations’ Technology Leaders in Montreal to Shape Sovereign AI Strategy
entry.summary: NVIDIA’s Kari Briski joins Canada’s AI Minister Evan Solomon and Cohere’s Aidan Gomez in a panel this week, as TELUS unveils Canada’s first fully sovereign AI factory in Rimouski and RBC Capital Markets creates AI agents for financial services.

entry.title: NVIDIA, OpenAI Announce 'the Biggest AI Infrastructure Deployment in History'
entry.summary: OpenAI and NVIDIA announced a partnership that will scale OpenAI’s compute with at least 10 gigawatts of data centers powered by millions of GPUs.

entry.title: The UK’s ‘Goldilocks Moment for AI’: NVIDIA, UK and US Leaders Highlight AI Infrastructure Investments
entry.summary: NVIDIA founder and CEO Jensen Huang discussed the UK’s plans to become an AI superpower with UK Prime Minister Keir Starmer, UK Secretary of State for Science, Innovation and Technology Liz Kendall, UK Secretary of State for Business and Trade Peter Kyle, and US Secretary of Commerce Howard Lutnick.

entry.title: NVIDIA Accelerates Robotics Research and Development With New Open Models and Simulation Libraries
entry.summary: NVIDIA today announced that the open‑source Newton Physics Engine is now available in NVIDIA Isaac™ Lab, along with the open NVIDIA Isaac GR00T N1.6 reasoning vision language action model for robot skills and new AI infrastructure.

entry.title: OpenAI and NVIDIA Announce Strategic Partnership to Deploy 10 Gigawatts of NVIDIA Systems
entry.summary: OpenAI and NVIDIA today announced a letter of intent for a landmark strategic partnership to deploy at least 10 gigawatts of NVIDIA systems for OpenAI’s next-generation AI infrastructure to train and run its next generation of models on the path to deploying superintelligence.
